item.title: Notes on Recommendation System
item.description: What is a Recommendation System? Recommendation system helps people to find things, when the process of finding the information you need might be a little bit challenging, since there’s too many choices. There are two types of recommendation engine: most popular (Non personalized: normally top-n algorithm) by features among all users -> this needs to classify the users into various segments. (personalized) Techniques Non-personalized: Popularity Frequency count Mean Rating Association Rule Mining Apriori algorithm: beers and diapers Pros: no need to analyze the personalized data
